channel.title: [508] add and remove npc's
channel.description: hello. my friend sends me a tutorial for add shops on a npc. i wanna have the shop on the bandit shopkeeper but i need to add him then. can some1 say how i can do that? and also how to remove a npc. (cuz there is an jad in edgeville =P) i hope some1 know how i can do that.
